## GitHub repository information: https://github.com/JeffPangding/STATS-220-.git

The repository shows the four favorite anime. They are Onepeice,dargon ball, naruto and slam dunk. 

```{r}
counts <- 4 : 1 %>% as.character()

circle_image <- image_read("https://static.cnbetacdn.com/article/2021/0130/868d4af2911ad51.jpg") %>%
  image_scale(500)

circle_image1 <- image_read("https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/naruto/images/d/d6/Naruto_Part_I.png/revision/latest?cb=20210223094656") %>%
  image_scale(500)

circle_image2 <- image_read("https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/dragonball/images/1/10/EveryoneInDragonBallZ.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110508001535") %>%
  image_scale(500)

circle_image3 <- image_read("https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/517kus7+75L._SX331_BO1,204,203,200_.jpg") %>%
  image_scale(500)

frame1 <- circle_image %>%
  image_annotate(text = "ONEPEICE", size = 40,color = "#FFB3FF") %>%
  image_scale(500) %>%
  image_extent("500x500")

frame2 <- circle_image1 %>%
  image_annotate(text = "Naruto", size = 40,color = "#FFB3FF" ) %>%
  image_scale(500) %>%
  image_extent("500x500")

frame3 <- circle_image2 %>%
  image_annotate(text = "Dragon ball", size = 40,color = "#FFB3FF",) %>%
  image_scale(500) %>%
  image_extent("500x500")

frame4 <- circle_image3 %>%
  image_annotate(text = "Slam dunk", size = 40, color = "#FFB3FF") %>%
  image_scale(500)


frames <- c(frame1, frame2, frame3, frame4)

# creating an animation
image_animate(frames, fps = 1)
```
